scenarios.name: Year Navigation Buttons
scenarios.description: Test the 'Previous year' and 'Next year' navigation buttons allowing users to switch between years (REQ-1, REQ-2, US-1)

steps.description: Navigate to the main gallery page without any year parameter
steps.context: User lands on the application for the first time

steps.description: Confirm the current year is displayed by default with year shown between navigation buttons
Verify 'Previous year' (← Previous year) and 'Next year' (Next year →) buttons are displayed
steps.context: Year navigation buttons should be prominently placed near title

steps.description: Click on the 'Previous year' button to navigate to the previous year
steps.context: User wants to view past media consumption

steps.action: Verify page navigates to previous year
steps.description: Confirm the page displays media consumption for the previous year and URL updates
steps.context: URL should change to reflect the year path (e.g., /2025)

steps.description: Click on the 'Next year' button to navigate back
steps.context: User wants to return to more recent year

steps.description: Verify 'Previous year' is disabled on earliest year and 'Next year' is disabled on latest year
steps.context: Buttons should be disabled at year boundaries

test_cases.expected: Current year (2026) is displayed by default between navigation buttons
Page navigates to 2025, URL changes to /2025
Page navigates to 2026, URL changes to /2026
'Previous year' button is disabled, 'Next year' button is enabled
'Next year' button is disabled, 'Previous year' button is enabled
Component displays '← Previous year' button, current year, and 'Next year →' button

test_cases.input: Year range calculation with current year 2026 and start year 2020
test_cases.expected: Previous year button navigates within range [2020-2026]

scenarios.description: Test that year selection state persists in URL for shareability and bookmarking (REQ-6, US-3)

steps.action: Navigate to a year via navigation buttons
steps.description: Click 'Previous year' button to go to 2025
steps.context: Starting from default current year view

steps.description: Check that URL changes to year path (e.g., /2025)
steps.context: URL should update with page navigation

steps.description: Copy the URL and open in new browser tab
Confirm the page loads directly to 2025 view

test_cases.expected: URL updates to /2025
Page loads with 2023 data displayed
Year navigation shows 2024 as current year
Falls back to current year gracefully
Falls back to earliest supported year (2020) or current year
Returns 2023 as selected year

scenarios.name: Grid Layout Display
scenarios.description: Test the tiled grid layout for displaying covers organized by category (REQ-3, REQ-4, US-2)

steps.description: Navigate to the gallery with valid year data
steps.context: Year with media consumption data exists

steps.description: Confirm four category sections are visible: Books, Screen, Music, Games
steps.context: Categories displayed as 'I read', 'I watched', 'I listened', 'I played'

steps.description: Each category displays covers in a responsive grid format
steps.context: CSS Grid with auto-fill/auto-fit for responsiveness

steps.description: All covers are visible without requiring horizontal scroll or animation
steps.context: No carousel behavior - all items displayed at once

test_cases.input: Load page with year containing books data
test_cases.expected: Books section displays covers in grid layout

test_cases.input: Load page with year containing screen data
test_cases.expected: Screen section displays movie and TV covers in grid
Grid uses CSS Grid with proper gap spacing and auto-fit columns
All 10 items visible without horizontal scrollbar
Component renders with category title header and grid container

scenarios.name: Responsive Grid on Mobile
scenarios.description: Test responsive design with grid layout adapting to mobile, tablet, and desktop viewports (NFR-2, US-6)

steps.description: Load page on viewport > 1024px
Grid shows 10 columns on desktop (covers may appear small but enlarge on hover)
Resize to tablet viewport (768px-1024px)
Grid shows 5 columns on tablet
Resize to mobile viewport (< 768px)
Grid shows 3 columns on mobile

test_cases.expected: Grid displays 10 columns
Grid displays 5 columns
Grid displays 3 columns
Covers remain properly sized and tappable (min 44px touch target)

test_cases.input: Year navigation buttons on mobile viewport
test_cases.expected: Navigation buttons are accessible and usable on mobile
Grid uses appropriate breakpoints for responsive columns
